Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to processing fees resulting from credit card or other non-cash payments selected by passengers of taxicabs and for-hire transportation
Summary: Relates to processing fees resulting from credit card or other non-cash payments selected by passengers of taxicabs and for-hire transportation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to processing fees resulting from credit card or other non-cash payments selected by passengers of taxicabs and for-hire transportation
